00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00044 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 void GPIO_Configuration(void);
00046 void GPIO_OutputBit(void);
00047 void GPIO_OutputData(void);
00048 
00049 static void __Delay(u32 count);
00050 
00051 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00053   * @brief  Main program.
00054   * @retval None
00055   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00056 int main(void)
00057 {
00058   GPIO_Configuration();
00059 
00060   while (1)
00061   {
00062 
00063     GPIO_OutputBit();
00064 
00065     GPIO_OutputData();
00066 
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Configure the GPIO as output mode.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 void GPIO_Configuration(void)
00075 {
00076   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00077     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00078     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00079     CKCUClock.Bit.PB = 1;
00080     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00081   }
00082 
00083   { /* Configure GPIO as output mode                                                                        */
00084 
00085     /* Configure AFIO mode as GPIO                                                                          */
00086     AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PB, AFIO_PIN_1, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00087 
00088     /* Configure GPIO pull resistor                                                                         */
00089     GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1, GPIO_PR_DOWN);
00090 
00091     /* Default value RESET/SET                                                                              */
00092     GPIO_WriteOutBits(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1, RESET);
00093 
00094     /* Configure GPIO direction as output                                                                   */
00095     GPIO_DirectionConfig(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00096   }
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00100   * @brief  GPIO Output bit test
00101   * @retval None
00102   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00103 void GPIO_OutputBit(void)
00104 {
00105   GPIO_SetOutBits(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1); // GPIO = HIGH
00106   __Delay(500000);
00107 
00108   GPIO_ClearOutBits(HT_GPIOB, GPIO_PIN_1); // GPIO = LOW
00109   __Delay(5000000);
00110 }
00111 
00112 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00113   * @brief  GPIO Output data test
00114   * @retval None
00115   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00116 void GPIO_OutputData(void)
00117 {
00118   u16 uOutputData;
00119 
00120   uOutputData = GPIO_ReadOutData(HT_GPIOB);
00121   uOutputData |= GPIO_PIN_1; // GPIO = HIGH
00122   GPIO_WriteOutData(HT_GPIOB, uOutputData);
00123   __Delay(500000);
00124 
00125   uOutputData = GPIO_ReadOutData(HT_GPIOB);
00126   uOutputData &= ~(GPIO_PIN_1); // GPIO = LOW
00127   GPIO_WriteOutData(HT_GPIOB, uOutputData);
00128   __Delay(5000000);
00129 }
00130 
00131 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00132 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00133   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.

00138 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00140   /*
00141      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00142      Debug message can be added here.
00143      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00144   */
00145 
00146   while (1)
00147   {
00148   }
00149 }
00150 #endif

00152 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00153 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00154   * @brief  delay function
00155   * @param  count: delay count for loop
00156   * @retval None
00157   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00158 static void __Delay(u32 count)
00159 {
00160   while (count--)
00161   {
00162     __NOP(); // Prevent delay loop be optimized
00163   }
00164 }
